net.proteusframework.users.authentication

Interface LoginAsDecisionProvider


  • public interface LoginAsDecisionProvider
    Interface for classes that implement application logic regarding who can login as who.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canLoginAs(Principal loginPrincipal, Principal loginAsPrincipal)
      Check to see if loginPrincipal can login as loginAsPrincipal.

    • Method Detail

      • canLoginAs

        boolean canLoginAs(Principal loginPrincipal,
                 Principal loginAsPrincipal)
        Check to see if loginPrincipal can login as loginAsPrincipal. Implementations of this method should do application specific checking. The caller will ensure hard-coded logic such as requiring loginPrincipal to have login-as permission and ensuring that loginPrincipal has at least the same AcegiPermission's as loginAsPrincipal.
        Parameters:
        loginPrincipal - the principal doing the login
        loginAsPrincipal - the principal that loginPrincipal is logging in as.
        Returns:
        true if loginPrincipal should be allowed to login as loginAsPrincipal
